description: Joe is back with internet for the show this week and things are back to normal. We talked about strippers, amputated body parts, and I tell several long winded stories about my childhood that really have nothing to do with what we were talking about.
html_description: Joe is back with internet for the show this week and things are back to normal. We talked about strippers, amputated body parts, and I tell several long winded stories about my childhood that really have nothing to do with what we were talking about.
name: Ghost The Whole Time

show.description: Establish in 2009, Just Cool Enough is dedicated to that "uncomfortably funny" feeling that life events tend to have. JoinEric,Joe, &Ikeon their incredible podcast journey.Follow@JCEshowon Twitter or send an old fashion email to TheShow@JustCoolEnough.com
